 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָחַק‎</span>] **verb** ==laugh== (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, ***laugh***, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, compare [[BDB#Ba|Ba]]<sup>Es 34</sup>; see also  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂחק‎</span>); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָֽחֲקָה‎</span> [[Gen.18.13|Gen 18:13]], etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִצֲחַקֿ‎</span> [[Gen.21.6|Gen 21:6]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּצְחָ֑ק‎</span> [[Gen.17.17|Gen 17:17]] 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתִּצְחַק‎</span> [[Gen.18.12|Gen 18:12]] — ***laugh***, [[Gen.18.12|Gen 18:12]]; [[Gen.18.13|Gen 18:13]]; [[Gen.18.15|Gen 18:15]] (twice in verse) ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Gen.17.17|Gen 17:17]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> ***at, concerning***, [[Gen.21.6|Gen 21:6]]. **Pi\`el** ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְצַחֵק‎</span> [[Judg.16.25|Judg 16:25]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְצַחֵק‎</span> [[Exod.32.6|Exod 32:6]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְצַ֫חֶק בָּנוּ (בִּיׅ‎</span> [[Gen.39.14|Gen 39:14]]; [[Gen.39.17|Gen 39:17]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְצַחֵק‎</span> [[Gen.19.14|Gen 19:14]]; [[Gen.26.8|Gen 26:8]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְצַחֶ֑ק‎</span> [[Gen.21.9|Gen 21:9]] — 

**1.** ***jest*** [[Gen.19.14|Gen 19:14]] ([[BDB#J|J]]). 

**2.** ***sport, play*** [[Gen.21.9|Gen 21:9]] ([[BDB#E|E]]) [[Exod.32.6|Exod 32:6]] ([[BDB#J|J]]); ***make sport*** for [[Judg.16.25|Judg 16:25]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִפְנֵי‎</span>; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וִישַׂחֶקלָֿ֑נוּ‎</span>); ***toy with*** (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶת‎</span>), of conjugal caresses [[Gen.26.8|Gen 26:8]] (compare [[BDB#Doughty|Doughty]]<sup>Arab. Des. i. 231</sup>), ***make a toy of***, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span>, [[Gen.39.14|Gen 39:14]]; [[Gen.39.17|Gen 39:17]] (all [[BDB#J|J]]).
